faqs.question: Are flats in sector 51 generally RERA approved and legally compliant properties
faqs.answer: Yes, all newly launched and currently under-construction residential projects offering flats for sale in sector 51 must be registered under RERA (Real Estate Regulatory Authority) to ensure transparency and accountability.
